--- title: "02 Supervised ML" author: "Rafid Hassan" --- ::: {.cell hash='02_ml_supervised_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_4fc56e325ae9efb7d4ee40f7eccac9ae'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidymodels) library(broom.mixed) library(xgboost) library(tidyverse) library(parsnip) library(recipes) library(rsample) library(yardstick) library(rpart.plot) library(modeldata) # Data exploration bike_data_tbl <- readRDS("C:/Users/RAFID/Documents/GitHub/ss23-bdml-Rafidhassan981/raw_data/bike_orderlines.rds") model_sales_tbl <- bike_data_tbl %>% select(total_price, model, category_2, frame_material) %>% group_by(model, category_2, frame_material) %>% summarise(total_sales = sum(total_price)) %>% ungroup() %>% arrange(desc(total_sales)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> `summarise()` has grouped output by 'model', 'category_2'. You can override #> using the `.groups` argument. ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} model_sales_tbl %>% mutate(category_2 = as_factor(category_2) %>% fct_reorder(total_sales, .fun = max) %>% fct_rev()) %>% ggplot(aes(frame_material, total_sales)) + geom_violin() + geom_jitter(width = 0.1, alpha = 0.5, color = "#2c3e50") + #coord_flip() + facet_wrap(~ category_2) + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::dollar_format(scale = 1e-6, suffix = "M", accuracy = 0.1)) + tidyquant::theme_tq() + labs( title = "Total Sales for Each Model", x = "Frame Material", y = "Revenue" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'quantmod': #> method from #> as.zoo.data.frame zoo ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: Groups with fewer than two data points have been dropped. #> Groups with fewer than two data points have been dropped. #> Groups with fewer than two data points have been dropped. ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning in max(data$density): no non-missing arguments to max; returning -Inf ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: Computation failed in `stat_ydensity()` #> Caused by error in `$<-.data.frame`: #> ! replacement has 1 row, data has 0 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_ml_supervised_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} bike_features_tbl <- readRDS("C:/Users/RAFID/Documents/GitHub/ss23-bdml-Rafidhassan981/raw_data/bike_features_tbl.rds") bike_features_tbl <- bike_features_tbl %>% select(frame_material:gender, `Rear Derailleur`, `Shift Lever`) %>% mutate( `shimano dura-ace` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("shimano dura-ace ") %>% as.numeric(), `shimano ultegra` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("shimano ultegra ") %>% as.numeric(), `shimano 105` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("shimano 105 ") %>% as.numeric(), `shimano tiagra` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("shimano tiagra ") %>% as.numeric(), `Shimano sora` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("shimano sora") %>% as.numeric(), `shimano deore` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("shimano deore(?! xt)") %>% as.numeric(), `shimano slx` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("shimano slx") %>% as.numeric(), `shimano grx` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("shimano grx") %>% as.numeric(), `Shimano xt` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("shimano deore xt |shimano xt ") %>% as.numeric(), `Shimano xtr` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("shimano xtr") %>% as.numeric(), `Shimano saint` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("shimano saint") %>% as.numeric(), `SRAM red` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("sram red") %>% as.numeric(), `SRAM force` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("sram force") %>% as.numeric(), `SRAM rival` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("sram rival") %>% as.numeric(), `SRAM apex` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("sram apex") %>% as.numeric(), `SRAM xx1` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("sram xx1") %>% as.numeric(), `SRAM x01` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("sram x01|sram xo1") %>% as.numeric(), `SRAM gx` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("sram gx") %>% as.numeric(), `SRAM nx` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("sram nx") %>% as.numeric(), `SRAM sx` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("sram sx") %>% as.numeric(), `SRAM sx` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("sram sx") %>% as.numeric(), `Campagnolo potenza` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("campagnolo potenza") %>% as.numeric(), `Campagnolo super record` = `Rear Derailleur` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("campagnolo super record") %>% as.numeric(), `shimano nexus` = `Shift Lever` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("shimano nexus") %>% as.numeric(), `shimano alfine` = `Shift Lever` %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_detect("shimano alfine") %>% as.numeric() ) %>% select(-c(`Rear Derailleur`, `Shift Lever`)) %>% mutate_if(is.numeric, ~replace(., is.na(.), 0)) bike_features_tbl <- bike_features_tbl %>% mutate(id = row_number()) %>% mutate(frame_material = factor(frame_material)) %>% select(id, everything()) bike_features_tbl %>% distinct(category_2) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} split_obj <- rsample::initial_split(bike_features_tbl, prop = 0.80, strata = "category_2") split_obj %>% training() %>% distinct(category_2) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} split_obj %>% testing() %>% distinct(category_2) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} train_tbl <- training(split_obj) test_tbl <- testing(split_obj) train_data <- train_tbl %>% set_names(str_replace_all(names(train_tbl), " |-", "_")) test_data <- test_tbl %>% set_names(str_replace_all(names(test_tbl), " |-", "_")) # recipe bike_rec <- recipe(frame_material ~ ., data = train_data) %>% step_dummy(all_nominal(), -all_outcomes()) %>% step_zv(all_predictors()) d <- summary(bike_rec) lr_mod <- logistic_reg() %>% set_engine("glm") lr_mod ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> Logistic Regression Model Specification (classification) #> #> Computational engine: glm ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} bike_wflow <- workflow() %>% add_model(lr_mod) %>% add_recipe(bike_rec) bike_wflow ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> ══ Workflow ════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> Preprocessor: Recipe #> Model: logistic_reg() #> #> ── Preprocessor ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> 2 Recipe Steps #> #> • step_dummy() #> • step_zv() #> #> ── Model ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Logistic Regression Model Specification (classification) #> #> Computational engine: glm ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} bike_fit <- bike_wflow %>% fit(data = train_data) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: glm.fit: algorithm did not converge ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: glm.fit: fitted probabilities numerically 0 or 1 occurred ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} bike_fit ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> ══ Workflow [trained] ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> Preprocessor: Recipe #> Model: logistic_reg() #> #> ── Preprocessor ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> 2 Recipe Steps #> #> • step_dummy() #> • step_zv() #> #> ── Model ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> #> Call: stats::glm(formula = ..y ~ ., family = stats::binomial, data = data) #> #> Coefficients: #> (Intercept) id #> 171.07141 0.42706 #> weight price #> -22.93923 0.06928 #> shimano_dura_ace shimano_ultegra #> -271.96832 -25.09137 #> shimano_105 shimano_tiagra #> 8.81318 19.10245 #> shimano_deore shimano_slx #> 56.50464 37.73447 #> shimano_grx Shimano_xt #> 47.51743 -24.12717 #> Shimano_saint SRAM_red #> 133.55166 -263.87182 #> SRAM_force SRAM_rival #> -61.89809 7.38995 #> SRAM_apex SRAM_xx1 #> 5.41786 -87.50277 #> SRAM_x01 SRAM_gx #> -24.18416 33.79305 #> SRAM_nx SRAM_sx #> 57.56875 25.86707 #> Campagnolo_super_record shimano_nexus #> -347.22108 17.86848 #> shimano_alfine category_1_Gravel #> -34.47279 -232.11142 #> category_1_Hybrid...City category_1_Mountain #> -124.58264 -148.97297 #> category_1_Road category_2_All.Road #> -115.70433 146.21204 #> category_2_City category_2_Cross.Country #> -36.51805 -27.95474 #> category_2_Cyclocross category_2_Dirt.Jump #> -22.90933 29.71279 #> category_2_Downhill category_2_E.City #> -134.22795 -35.17564 #> category_2_E.Fitness category_2_E.Gravel #> -206.14797 -182.45978 #> category_2_E.Mountain category_2_E.Road #> 3.69630 -128.24839 #> category_2_E.Trekking category_2_Endurance #> NA -0.92711 #> category_2_Enduro category_2_Fat.Bikes #> -12.96369 74.39925 #> category_2_Race category_2_Touring #> -53.83516 NA #> #> ... #> and 34 more lines. ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} bike_fit %>% pull_workflow_fit() %>% tidy() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: `pull_workflow_fit()` was deprecated in workflows 0.2.3. #> ℹ Please use `extract_fit_parsnip()` instead. ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} bike_pred <- predict(bike_fit, test_data, type="prob") %>% bind_cols(test_data %>% select(frame_material, category_2)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning in predict.lm(object, newdata, se.fit, scale = 1, type = if (type == : #> prediction from rank-deficient fit; attr(*, "non-estim") has doubtful cases ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} bike_pred %>% roc_curve(truth = frame_material, .pred_aluminium) %>% autoplot() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_ml_supervised_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-2.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} bike_pred %>% roc_curve(truth = frame_material, .pred_carbon) %>% autoplot() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_ml_supervised_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-3.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} bike_pred ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} roc_al <- bike_pred %>% roc_auc(truth = frame_material, .pred_aluminium) roc_al ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} roc_car <- bike_pred %>% roc_auc(truth = frame_material, .pred_carbon) roc_car ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # Evaluation model_01_linear_lm_simple <- linear_reg(mode = "regression") %>% set_engine("lm") %>% fit(price ~ category_2 + frame_material, data = train_data) model_01_linear_lm_simple ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> parsnip model object #> #> #> Call: #> stats::lm(formula = price ~ category_2 + frame_material, data = data) #> #> Coefficients: #> (Intercept) category_2All-Road category_2City #> 1974.5 -583.9 -1218.0 #> category_2Cross-Country category_2Cyclocross category_2Dirt Jump #> 202.6 -627.9 -708.8 #> category_2Downhill category_2E-City category_2E-Fitness #> 1591.4 871.5 1067.9 #> category_2E-Gravel category_2E-Mountain category_2E-Road #> 1345.0 1268.5 944.5 #> category_2E-Trekking category_2Endurance category_2Enduro #> 1490.5 -346.9 366.6 #> category_2Fat Bikes category_2Race category_2Touring #> -1460.0 747.9 -803.0 #> category_2Trail category_2Triathlon Bike frame_materialcarbon #> -301.6 456.4 1869.5 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} test_data <- test_data %>% filter(category_2 != "Fat Bikes") yards <- model_01_linear_lm_simple yards ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> parsnip model object #> #> #> Call: #> stats::lm(formula = price ~ category_2 + frame_material, data = data) #> #> Coefficients: #> (Intercept) category_2All-Road category_2City #> 1974.5 -583.9 -1218.0 #> category_2Cross-Country category_2Cyclocross category_2Dirt Jump #> 202.6 -627.9 -708.8 #> category_2Downhill category_2E-City category_2E-Fitness #> 1591.4 871.5 1067.9 #> category_2E-Gravel category_2E-Mountain category_2E-Road #> 1345.0 1268.5 944.5 #> category_2E-Trekking category_2Endurance category_2Enduro #> 1490.5 -346.9 366.6 #> category_2Fat Bikes category_2Race category_2Touring #> -1460.0 747.9 -803.0 #> category_2Trail category_2Triathlon Bike frame_materialcarbon #> -301.6 456.4 1869.5 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} g1 <- bike_features_tbl %>% mutate(category_2 = as.factor(category_2) %>% fct_reorder(price)) %>% ggplot(aes(category_2, price)) + geom_violin() + geom_jitter(width = 0.1, alpha = 0.5, color = "#2dc6d6") + coord_flip() + facet_wrap(~ frame_material) + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::dollar_format()) + labs( title = "Unit Price for Each Model", y = "", x = "Category 2" ) g1 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: Groups with fewer than two data points have been dropped. ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: Groups with fewer than two data points have been dropped. #> Groups with fewer than two data points have been dropped. ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_ml_supervised_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-4.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} new_race_alu <- tibble( model = "Exceed AL SL new", category_2 = "Race", frame_material = "aluminium", shimano_dura_ace = 0, shimano_ultegra = 0, shimano_105 = 0, shimano_tiagra = 0, Shimano_sora = 0, shimano_deore = 0, shimano_slx = 0, shimano_grx = 0, Shimano_xt = 1, Shimano_xtr = 0, Shimano_saint = 0, SRAM_red = 0, SRAM_force = 0, SRAM_rival = 0, SRAM_apex = 0, SRAM_xx1 = 0, SRAM_x01 = 0, SRAM_gx = 0, SRAM_nx = 0, SRAM_sx = 0, Campagnolo_potenza = 0, Campagnolo_super_record = 0, shimano_nexus = 0, shimano_alfine = 0 ) new_race_alu ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} predict(model_01_linear_lm_simple, new_data = new_race_alu) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} models_tbl <- tibble( model_id = str_c("Model 0", 1:1), model = list( model_01_linear_lm_simple ) ) models_tbl ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} predictions_new_race_alu_tbl <- models_tbl %>% mutate(predictions = map(model, predict, new_data = new_race_alu)) %>% unnest(predictions) %>% mutate(category_2 = "Race") %>% left_join(new_race_alu, by = "category_2") predictions_new_race_alu_tbl ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} g2 <- g1 + geom_point(aes(y = .pred), color = "red", alpha = 0.5, data = predictions_new_race_alu_tbl) + ggrepel::geom_text_repel(aes(label = model_id, y = .pred), size = 3, data = predictions_new_race_alu_tbl) g2 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: Groups with fewer than two data points have been dropped. #> Groups with fewer than two data points have been dropped. #> Groups with fewer than two data points have been dropped. ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_ml_supervised_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-5.png){width=672} ::: :::
